about_the_game:
Line Simulator soundtrack is a reflection of this quirky virtual reality game where you can create bizarre ways to get yourself to the front of the line, complete mini-quests, and discover the secrets of the duck.

We want to offer totally free our soundtrack composed by the talented composer Carlos Casado to accompany you in your musical moments! With hints of bossa nova and jazz, the relaxed tone is perfect to play it in the background of your work or study hours.

We hope you enjoy it!

name: Line Simulator Soundtrack
short_description: Think back to the endless queues of Line Simulator by listening again to its entire soundtrack completely free!
